inputs.name: OctaneServiceConnection
inputs.label: CSDP/SDM service/server end point
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the the CSDP/SDM endpoint to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service endpoint of type 'CSDP/SDM'

inputs.name: WorkspaceList
inputs.label: Target CSDP/SDM workspaces
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of target CSDP/SDM workspaces

inputs.name: CreatePipelineCheckbox
inputs.label: Create CSDP/SDM pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, a pipeline is created in CSDP/SDM. For versions 16.2.100 and higher, selecting the checkbox creates a pipeline, while clearing it prevents pipeline creation. Prior versions always create a pipeline, irrespective of the checkbox. Clearing the checkbox does not remove an existing pipeline.

inputs.name: UseFullPipelinePath
inputs.label: Use full pipeline path as a name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a pipeline with the name of the full pipeline path. As the pipeline name in CSDP/SDM must be unique, use this option to differentiate between pipelines that have the same name. This value only applies to new pipelines. It does not affect existing ones.

inputs.name: PipelineNameCreated
inputs.label: CSDP/SDM Pipeline name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the new pipeline in CSDP/SDM. This value only applies to new pipelines and does not affect existing pipelines. Leave the field empty to use the pipelineâ€™s name in Azure DevOps, as its name for CSDP/SDM.
